dmca.title: [ABUSE] Copy write infringements, Unauthorized/Illegal sales]
dmca.body:
nc

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Thursday, May 05, 2005 10:15 AM
To: abuse@newedge.com
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Copy write infringements, Unauthorized/Illegal sales]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject:         [ABUSE] Copy write infringements, Unauthorized/Illegal sales
Date:         Thu, 5 May 2005 09:42:12 -0400
From:         <abuse@newedge.com>
To:         <abuse@theplanet.com>, <copywrite@theplanet.com>,
<support@theplanet.com>





To whom it may concern,
I, Dwight Shepherd (abuse@newedge.com ) have been notified by NEWEDGE
Services Inc. and authorized by them as there abuse contact pertaining to
the use of your services to aid in the fraudulent sales and distribution of
a copy write software "Clientexec" hosting billing software produced by
NEWEDGE Services Inc., the website of the legal sales can be seen at
http://clientexec.com <http://clientexec.com/>, and I be fraudulently sold
(reskined) under the name of ?FlexClient? I have contacted the proper
associated companies and services including yourself now and all are being
notified:

PayPal.com - Accepted payment gateway
Authorized.net - Accepted payment gateway ~ EBay.com - Online Auction
ThePlanet DC (hosting Data Center)


The Fraudulent software's site using your services can be seen at
http://www.flexclient.com <http://www.flexclient.com/> with an IP address of
67.19.68.100
Registrant:

~ Incredible Power.com

~ 205 W. Anywhere Street

~ Dallas, TX 75090

~ US



~ Domain name: FLEXCLIENT.COM



~ Administrative Contact:

~    Misla, Tracy  tracy@incrediblepower.com

~    205 W. Anywhere Street

~    Dallas, TX 75090

~    US

~    000-000-0000

Please also this is only a reskined illegal copy of our product, visit the
websites to see the same scripting within! Note we also believe this is the
same group that was doing the same scam on LayeredTechs network which they
where forced removed by use before, only under a different product name!

This matter must be taken care of immediate before further legal actions
will be taken, your compliance in this matter will be greatly appreciated
and noted to relive you from any further actions! Please, reply with any
correspondence to abuse@newedge.com!

Offences:
{x} Copy write infringements of said software.
{x} Unauthorized/Illegal use of said software.
{x} Unauthorized/Illegal sales of said software.
{x} Unauthorized/Illegal distribution of said software.


~ Sincerely
Dwight Shepherd
abuse@newedge.com


- --
Thanks,
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Thunderbird - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

=xHJt
